title: Losing 70 lbs for Air Force Recruitment

content: Don't start any diet/excercise plan without making a visit to your M.D. And don't use any of those "fad diets" that you see on those infomercials. Again, visit with your doctor, get his/her advise and see if he/she can get you a consult with a nutritionist and a personal trainer. Better to be safe and healthy than be sorry and in pain. Remember, this is your health we are talking about and it's nothing to fool around with when it comes to weight loss.

content: Everyone seems to be in agreement...see your first. Don't be in a hurry, it takes a while to gain weight, it will take a while to loose weight. Don't get involved in one of those, "loose weight fast scams" like you see on tv, they are in it for the money, they don't give a rip about you. Good luck! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
